subject: Pro X Pedals ordered on the 7th showing still not shipped.
description_text:
Why is this?
Order #SSN4509
Can you please give me an update or I might have to refund and order elsewhere.
Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Peter Apers, We sincerely apologize for the delay caused by the shortage of baseplate stock in our U.S. warehouse. We will ship your order immediately upon receiving the item today.
Please update me when they are shipped. Thank you.
